aboutMe.description:
Hello, I am Dorian "Crooser" Moy, a junior french Fullstack Developer, 5th year Student and Teacher at the parisian Epitech's campus.

I am mostly proficient with TypeScript-based stacks but I can also work with C/C++, Python, Java and Rust.

My year goals are to learn more about Web3 and Offensive Cybersecurity which are two fields I am passionate about.

Lastly, if you cannot find me in front of my desk, I am probably in the nearest EDM festival or club dancing Hakken.

projects.title: pigeactive.fr
projects.description: A simple and efficient SaaS tool to allow french real estate agents to find and manage their leads.

projects.title: app.bedrock.im (School Project)
projects.description: My End of Studies project, a all in one suite for managing your personal and professional documents. The next decentralized and confidential Office 365/Google Suite.

projects.description: The LibertAI website, explaining the project and its goals.

projects.title: Trombiday (School project)
